nodes.text: Raurlu Eloz was an individual from Glakka. When a Rebel operative, posing as a Glakka merchant, approached ISB captain Jeffren Brek, he was asked if he knew Raurlu Eloz or Zoort. When Brek received a negative response, he was easily able to deduce that he was in fact dealing with a Rebel spy.
Judging by Brek's behavior, it is likely that Raurlu Eloz was a factual individual, although he could still be a part of Brek's ruse.
